trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event is raised when the Cancel button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>evento é desencadeado quando o cancelar no botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the Delete button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>evento é desencadeado quando a eliminação no botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand> event is raised when the Edit button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>evento é desencadeado quando a edição no botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand>evento é desencadeado quando qualquer botão de um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe programaticamente testar para quando se clica num botão de comando específico e execute as ações apropriadas.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é normalmente utilizado para processar botões de comando personalizados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the Update button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>evento é desencadeado quando a atualização no botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataGridCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de DataGridCommandEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>é criada por uma chamada para este construtor, as seguintes propriedades são inicializadas aos valores especificados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>|The value of the `item` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O valor da `commandSource` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>| O valor da `item` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> que representa o item selecionado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to determine the command source that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de CommandSource para determinar a origem de comando que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine which command raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é normalmente utilizada para determinar qual o comando gerado o evento.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item containing the command source in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item que contém a origem de comando no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Item property is used to access the properties of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Item é utilizada para aceder às propriedades do item selecionado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> que representa o item selecionado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo.
